description: This Dart source file defines the `LocalNotificationsService` class, which manages local notifications within a Flutter application. It provides methods to initialize notifications and show simple alerts, specifically tailored to Android and iOS platforms.

classes.name: LocalNotificationsService
classes.description: A class responsible for handling local notifications, including initialization and displaying simple notifications.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes local notifications with platform-specific settings if not already initialized.

methods.name: showSimple
methods.description: Displays a simple local notification with specified id, title, and body.
